'''Thomas Kane Roberts''' (1962) is an American voice actor. He has voiced a wide variety of recognizable characters in cartoons, including Professor Utonium of ''The Powerpuff Girls'', Monkey Fist in ''Kim Possible'', Darwin in ''The Wild Thornberries'' and Mr. Herriman in ''Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends''. He also provides the voices for Yoda and [[Anthony Daniels|C-3PO]] whenever their actors are not available.
 
==Roles==
* [[2012]]: ''[[Lego The Lord of the Rings: The Video Game]]'' - Additional Voices
* [[2011]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'' - [[Gandalf]]
* [[2010]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]'' - Narrator (second trailer), [[Gamling]]
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|The Hobbit]]'' - Narrator
* [[2001]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' - [[Gandalf]], [[Harry Goatleaf]], [[Nali (video game character)|Nali]]
